alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:23PM CST until January 12 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...NORTHWESTERN LONOKE...SOUTHEASTERN CONWAY... CENTRAL FAULKNER...SOUTHWESTERN WHITE AND NORTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1122 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vilonia, or 12 miles north of Little Rock AFB, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Cabot... Vilonia... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Pickles Gap... Little Italy... Toad Suck... Holland... Hamlet... Saltillo... El Paso... Otto... New Dixie... Floyd... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
